courses.customDesc: Choose one of the following: TH225, or TH230. Both TH225 and TH230 are required for the degree.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selected, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Choose one of the following: TH227, or TH228.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selected, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Choose one the following: TH290, or TH295. Both TH290 and TH295 are required for the degree.

Choose one of the following: TH215, TH235, TH240, TH245, TH255, TH256, TH260, TH265, TH270, TH275, TH280, TH285.

If not used to meet major core requirements, these courses may be used to meet other major electives. See catalog.

Repeatable courses may be taken twice: TH275, TH305, TH325, TH330, TH400, TH470, TH471, and TH480. Topic course can be taken with different topics to meet major electives as well as major core requirements: TH305.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR course or GWR exam can go here. Refer to the current catalog for prerequisites.
